Not a bad little game... it certainly has it's issues though. The graphics have textures and seeming polygonal counts that wouldn't have looked out of place back in 2004, they have inverted the up/down movement of the mouse and you cannot change it back - in fact, you can't assign any command to the mouse at all. 

It plays solidly, but the inverted mouse issue is enough to stop me from playing until it's resolved.

I believe this game hasn't been cracked properly.

Thanks for the upload Razor.

The game itself was an immediate disappointment. Outdated graphics and blurry cutscenes even with the graphics on high. Audio (particularly speech) was unbalanced and the voice acting sounds like it was done by the game designers themselves to save money. Didn't even wait to see the combat system in its full effect. I quit after 5 minutes out of sheer boredom.
Works great. Is it Lan capable?

For those who are having trouble with the G35 headset and this game, listen up!

Logitech G35 is a good headset, but it will not let most games start (operation flashpoint red river, crysis2, call of juarez) and many others. I returned mine to the site i bought them together with a long ass letter of rage telling them to stop selling Logitechs peice of shit hardware. 

The problem is in the drivers that comes with the headset. If you uninstall them, the games mentioned above will start normally. But not being able to have the 7.1 sound when you payed for it is like fucking with a condom. 

The Logitech g35 is the worst peice of shit headset i have ever bought, and i'm not talking about the quality, but the functionality.

Reached the 4th level, Acre, without any issues. No invincible bosses for me. Cool RPG, IMO, if a bit railroaded. Love the era its set in and the story. Graphics are a bit dated, but it feels alright nonetheless. Will probably buy.

works perfectly

i try to answer at some problems 
look how i fix some of them
first the crack is there in razor folder...
2. Go to setup folder and install/update the directX there vcredist_x86.exe and dotnetfx3.exe if you don`t have them
3, If game crash alt f4 or kill it from ctrl+alt+del then when you start again Enable Subtitles from general after start the game by Chapter Select
when the man finish the talk should appear Exit-Skip do that and the game should start 
3. I think the game have some bug with ati video cards mine is x1800 game little laggy but works 
sometime i have that
http://postmyimage.com/img1/465_TT1.JPG
i fix it by going to Catalyst Control Center and mark Disable Catalyst A.I is at 3D section
by moving the mouse and leave the church the bug should go 
4. If the mouse camera is on invert in game go at generals and at Invert Look make Yes 
Hope this helps gl hf 
any another idea how to fix geometric thing share it plz :) and the last thing be sure you have PhysX_9.10.0513 or similar at some games need that even if you don`t have a Nvidia video card

THE GAME IS AWESOME!! WORKS 100% IF YOU CANT GET IT TO WORK FOLLOW THESE STEPS:

1. at first, you dont need to patch this game ..

2. after you have 100% completed download use software named "poweriso" to mount the downloaded .iso image, poweriso can be downloaded from http://www.poweriso.com

3. mount the image and run setup, if the setup thing doesn't appear then go to my computer and open the mounted thing right click on the the first templar and left click open ... then find the setup and start install .. after the install is done go to the same place where you runned setup there you will find folder named razor1911

4. copy the tft file and paste it into the folder where you installed the game and overwrite with the original when asked so.. very simply!!

5. THNX FUCKING MUCH EXTREMEZONE, VERY LONG TIME SINCE I HAVE PLAYED AS GOOD GAME AS THIS .. FINALLY !!!
